definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more

sentences.english: Think sports cars and flashy SUVs depreciate the most?
sentences.chinese: 以爲跑車，奢華的越野車折價得最多嗎？

sentences.english: Still, high-end cars and SUVs are generally leaders when it comes to resale value.
sentences.chinese: 高檔轎車和越野車仍然是再售價中的鰲頭。

sentences.english: Already be the luxurious go-anywhere vehicle that money buys with helping Tibet all on the road.
sentences.chinese: 馬路上已經滿是用援藏款買的豪華越野車。

sentences.english: My experience with the Range Rover and Land Rover was an upside down experience.
sentences.chinese: 我對越野路華家家族的汽車的駕駛經驗是本未倒置的。

sentences.english: It turns out cross-country running was the perfect sport for me.
sentences.chinese: 最後發現跑越野對於我來說在適合不過了。

sentences.english: The bear leader bear-led a group of wealthy young men on a cross-country hike.
sentences.chinese: 家庭教師帶領一組富家子弟作越野遠足。

sentences.english: Primed for off-road impact or urban streets.
sentences.chinese: 底漆爲越野的影響或市區街道。

sentences.english: Recommended for trail runners who frequently mix in some roads and don't want to sacrifice off-road traction.
sentences.chinese: 經常混合路跑的，又不想犧牲越野跑抓地力的跑者。

sentences.english: His defeat in the last cross-country race depressed him.
sentences.chinese: 他在上一次越野賽中的失敗使他感到沮喪。

sentences.english: Large size is also an issue, George could only stand in the back seat of the master off-road vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 體型太大問題，喬治只能站在主人越野車的後座上。

sentences.english: I decided to write about crosscountry skiing.
Only Scandinavians have won gold medals in the men's winter Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 只有北歐人獲得了冬運會男子越野滑雪項目中的金牌。

sentences.english: General Motors Corp. showed off the 2010 GMC Terrain compact crossover vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽車公司展示了2010通用小型越野跨界車。

sentences.english: I like to drive my Monster Chevy Silverado 4X4 pickup truck.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡開我的雪佛蘭四驅越野皮卡車。

sentences.english: I do biking, running, swimming, gym, motocross , ski-doo.
sentences.chinese: 我騎車，跑步，游泳，健身，摩托越野，滑雪。

sentences.english: And the cars are prepared for the harsh conditions of the north.
sentences.chinese: 這些雪上越野車爲北極的嚴寒環境配備了應對裝備。

definition: racing bicycle (abbr. for 公路自行車|公路自行车[gong1 lu4 zi4 xing2 che1])
supercar/abbr. for 超級跑車|超级跑车[chao1 ji2 pao3 che1]
racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)
